title: 3BR Apartment for Sale in Mount Lavinia
details:
This is a recently refurbished 3 bedroom apartment with 2 bathrooms at Mount Breeze Apartments situated approx 200m from Galle Road and is in close proximity to Keells, Cargills, St Thomas’ College and Mount Lavinia Hotel along with many other restaurants, salons and retails stores.

The apartment is conveniently situated on the 1st floor. The master bedroom is air conditioned and both bathrooms have hot water. The hall has access to the balcony. There is a dedicated parking slot for the apartment on the ground floor and a shared drivers quarters / bathroom.

Clear dead and other documents readily available. Apartment was previously funded by a mortgage loan by HSBC.
